Project Proponent: Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd and Archer Pastoral Pty Ltd as the Trustee for Archer Pastoral Trust
Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Estimation of Soil Organic Carbon Sequestration using Measurement and Models) Methodology Determination 2021
Project Description: This project increases carbon in soil in the grazing system by altering the stocking rate, duration or intensity of grazing and re-establishing or rejuvenating a pasture by seeding.
Project Area(s), where the project is an:
7/RP911063, 63/CP903775, 11/MH794, 55/CP903775, 63/SP142363



This project is in the Goondiwindi local government area.
Is the project area or project areas sub: There is no carbon maintenance obligation on this project area
Name of person/s to whom the KACCUs issu: Archer Pastoral Pty Ltd as the Trustee for Archer Pastoral Trust
Notes:
6/9/2021 Variation of project method - from the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Sequestering Carbon in Soils in Grazing Systems) Methodology Determination 2014 to the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative- Measurement of Soil Carbon Sequestration in Agricultural Systems) Methodology Determination 2018.

17/05/2022 Variation to participant name - from Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd to Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd and Archer Pastoral Pty Ltd as the Trustee for Archer Pastoral Trust.

6/6/2022 Variation of project method - from the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative- Measurement of Soil Carbon Sequestration in Agricultural Systems) Methodology Determination 2018 to the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative-Estimation of Soil Organic Carbon Sequestration using Measurement and Models) Methodology Determination 2021.
